Package com.canoo.dolphin.server.javaee

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CdiBeanFactory
    Factory that provides all needed Dolphin Platform extensions as CDI beans.
    CdiContainerManager
    JavaEE / CDI based implementation of the ContainerManager
    ClientScopeContext  
    ClientScopeExtension  
    ClientScopeInstanceHolder<T>  
    DolphinContextListenerCdi
    This listener destroyes the ClientScoped CDI scope whenever a DolphinSession will be destroyed
    DolphinPlatformContextualLifecycle<T>
    Implements a CDI Lifecylce for Dolphin Platform Controllers
    DolphinPlatformJavaeeBootstrap
    The Dolphin Platform Boostrap for a JavaEE based application.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ModelInjectionException
    This exception will be thrown if a MVC model can't be created or injected in teh controller
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    ClientScoped
    A custom scope that is bound to the lifecycle of a DolphinSession
